scripts.dev:api: cd api && poetry run uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.dev:worker: cd workflows && poetry run python -m temporalio.worker --task-queue agenticai-tasks
scripts.test: pnpm run test:web && pnpm run test:api
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:web && pnpm run lint:api
scripts.lint:api: poetry run flake8 && poetry run mypy .
scripts.format: pnpm run format:web && pnpm run format:api
scripts.format:api: poetry run black . && poetry run isort .
scripts.db:migrate: cd api && poetry run alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:migration: cd api && poetry run alembic revision --autogenerate
scripts.db:reset: cd api && poetry run alembic downgrade base && poetry run alembic upgrade head
scripts.setup: pnpm install && poetry install && pnpm run docker:up && sleep 30 && pnpm run db:migrate
scripts.clean: pnpm run docker:down && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf web/node_modules && rm -rf .next && rm -rf web/.next && rm -rf dist && rm -rf build
scripts.security: pnpm audit && poetry run safety check && poetry run bandit -r .
